easy.q: I have three eyes but cannot see. I come in a pack of four and love to be eaten with cheese. What am I?

medium.q: What starts with a twirl, ends with a sigh, and hides in plain sight when you rearrange its letters?
medium.hint: An activity that makes you think.

hard.q: A light switch has two neighbors who always tell the truth or always lie. You can ask one yes/no question to one neighbor to determine the color of the house next door. What question do you ask, and what color is the house?
hard.a: Ask: 'If I asked your neighbor which color the house is, what would they say?' Then take the opposite color. The house is blue.
hard.hint: Use a question that cancels out truth-teller/liar differences.
